name: Product List
description:
## Product List
A customizable grid based layout that displays multiple products along with filtering and sorting options. Ideal for creating custom product listings or category pages.

properties.validation_message: Enter the pixel dimensions that the image should be cropped to (ex. 300x300)

tooltip.content: The first attribute with option-images and inventory enabled will be used for the swatches. Enter a comma-separated list of attribute-codes if you would like to only display swatches for certain attributes.
tooltip.title: Note

tooltip.content: The first attribute with option-images and inventory enabled will be used for the swatches. Enter a comma-separated list of attribute-types if you would like to only display swatches for certain attribute types. The options are: radio, select, & swatch-select.
tooltip.title: Note

tooltip.content: Selecting: "Form" displays a login form within the wishlist dialog, "Link" displays a button that when clicked will take people to a login page, and "None" does not provide any login option, so only logged in users will see the "Add to Wishlist" button.
tooltip.title: Login Method

properties.placeholder: You don't have any wishlists yet.

advanced_properties.placeholder: There are no products to display.

advanced_properties.validation_message: The params prefix must only contain alphanumeric or underscore characters

empty_results_message.value: There are no products to display.
